name: Noble Bros
author: Tenacious Stag
notes: Basically a copy pasta of Zero's deck. Was working with an 8 monster variant, but cutting them for econs made a big difference. A third Drystan will make your life a lot easier, but I only had 2 to work with. Got lucky with my Medraut pulls. All you need in hand is a monster, quick play, and equip spell. Only use the equips you need to avoid clogging your backrow and stay on top of your toggle plays.
